net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.Component
      • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.Image
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button

    public class Image
extends Component
    Used to render an Image to the screen as a Bitmap.
    Since:
    Mar 10, 2013 at 12:55:25 AM, v0.2
    Version:
    Mar 10, 2013 at 12:55:25 AM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

      • Image

        public Image(Panel parent)
        Construct an Image in the specified parent Panel.
        Parameters:
        parent - The Panel that is to be the parent of this Image.

      • Image

        public Image(Panel parent,
     Bundle bundle,
     int offset)
        Construct an Image in the specified parent Panel with the specified Bundle instance.
        Parameters:
        parent - The Panel that is to be the parent of this Image.
        bundle - The Bundle to use to store and render the Image.
        offset - The offset in the Bundle in which to add the Image. An Image takes up 12 values in the Bundle.

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
              int rx,
              int ry)
        Set the Texture of this Image Component by giving a BufferedImage that will be decoded into a Texture, and then repeated the specific amount of times horizontally and vertically.
        Parameters:
        image - The new Image of this Image Component.
        rx - The amount of times to repeat the Image horizontally.
        ry - The amount of times to repeat the Image vertically.

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(Texture texture,
              int rx,
              int ry)
        Set the Texture of this Image Component by giving an instance of a Texture, and then repeat it the specific amount of times horizontally and vertically.
        Parameters:
        image - The new Texture of this Image Component.
        rx - The amount of times to repeat the Texture horizontally.
        ry - The amount of times to repeat the Texture vertically.

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(java.lang.String location,
              boolean beginEditingBundle)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Set the Texture of this Image Component by giving the location of the image.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the Image.
        beginEditingBundle - Whether or not to tell the Bundle instance to begin editing the Textures.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there was any trouble reading the image.
